options.help:
Create visual showcases with multiple images. Ideal for:

  • Product portfolios
  • Project showcases
  • Event photo collections
  • Team member galleries
  • Before/after demonstrations

Tips for great galleries:

  • Use consistently sized images for the best presentation
  • Add descriptive headlines to provide context
  • Consider a tagline to explain what visitors are seeing
  • Organize images in a logical sequence
options.title: Gallery Block
